    • selectCourse

      public void selectCourse(String professorId, String courseId) throws CourseNotFoundException, CourseNotAvailableException, CourseAlreadyIndicatedException
      Description copied from interface: ProfessorDaoInterface
      Method to check if the course is already alloted or not, and then to allot the course using SQL commands
      Specified by:
      selectCourse in interface ProfessorDaoInterface
      Parameters:
      professorId - unique Id to represent a professor
      courseId - unique Id to represent a course
      Throws:
      CourseNotFoundException - if course with courseId not present in the database
      CourseNotAvailableException - if course with courseId already alloted to some professor
      CourseAlreadyIndicatedException - if course already selected by professor

    • addGrade

      public String addGrade(String studentId, String courseId, float grade, String semester)
      Description copied from interface: ProfessorDaoInterface
      Method for adding the grades of a student for a course in a semester using SQL commands
      Specified by:
      addGrade in interface ProfessorDaoInterface
      Parameters:
      studentId - unique Id to represent a student
      courseId - unique Id to represent a course
      grade - grade point provided for the student enrolled in the course taught by the professor
      semester - indicates the semester
      Returns:
      returns a string indicating the if the grade was successfully added in the database
